description: Arrival at Srinagar, Shankaracharya Temple, Mughal Gardens & Dal Lake.
Upon arrival at Srinagar met by our representative and transfer.
Start our Sightseeing tour by visit of Shankaracharya Temple.
In the afternoon, we take a visit to Mughal Gardens (Nishat, Shalimar, Chasma Shahi and Pari Mahal)
SRINAGAR TO SONMARG
After a leisurely breakfast, we check out from Hotel & transfer to Sonmarg
Sonmarg, which means Meadow of Gold.
The drive offers incredible scenic beauty, Dense pine forests and Gigantic mountains.
SRINAGAR TO GULMARG
Early morning Check Out from houseboat and proceed to Gulmarg
Gulmarg - the meadow of flowers is an apt term for this idyllic flower-laden meadow
Stroll leisurely or take pony rides (by your own payment) across the green meadow
A must is a fun-filled ride in the Gondola lift (by your own payment)
Return to Srinagar in the evening and enjoy a comfortable overnight stay at Hotel
SRINAGAR TO PAHALGAM
Enroute visit saffron Fields & 19th Century Awantipura Ruins
Rest of the day is free to enjoy and explore the Beauty of “Pahalgam” (ON OWN)
PAHALGAM TO SRINAGAR
Check-in at Super Deluxe houseboat, freshen up and relax at the luxury of the royal hospitality.
In the evening enjoy Shikara ride on Dal Lake and witness the marvel of the nature that is beyond visual and verbal descriptions.
The Sun-set view from the Shikara will engulf your heart and leave your spell bound.
Later enjoy the welcome dinner and overnight stay in the Houseboat.
DEPART SRINAGAR
Transfer to Airport or Railway Station: Say See you Soon! to the Goa & Memorable Destination's team Members & Proceed for your Safe onward journey.
Arrival in Jaisalmer, known as the Golden City.
Explore the majestic Jaisalmer Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage site.
Wander through narrow lanes, ancient havelis, and historic temples.
Embark on a thrilling desert safari in the Thar Desert.
Traverse the rugged terrain in 4x4 vehicles.
Camp under the starry sky and enjoy traditional Rajasthani hospitality.
Immerse yourself in Jaisalmer's cultural heritage.
Witness traditional dance and music performances.
Savor the flavors of Rajasthani cuisine.
Visit the bustling local markets of Jaisalmer.
Shop for local handicrafts, textiles, and jewelry.
Experience the vibrant colors and unique designs of the region.
Enjoy the serene beauty of Gadisar Lake.
Take a peaceful boat ride or a leisurely stroll around the lake.
Explore the surrounding temples and ghats.
Arrive Dubai - Transfer To Hotel + Evening Marina Dhow Cruise With Dinner
Upon your early morning arrival at Dubai/Sharjah airport, we’ll be there to greet you.
In the evening, you’re in for a treat with a Dhow Cruise on the Dubai Marina.
We’ll bring you back to the hotel for your first night in Dubai.
Half Day City Tour + Evening Desert Safari With Dinner
On Day 2, get ready for an exciting time in Dubai!
First, enjoy a half-day city tour where you’ll see Dubai Museum, Al Fahidi Fort, Burj Al Arab, Palm Island & more.
The Evening Desert Safari. Starting with convenient hotel pickup.
Capture mesmerizing sunset views as you explore.
Enjoy BBQ dinner under the stars with unlimited soft drinks.
Dubai Mall And Top Of Burj Khalifa
Today post Breakfast we proceed to “The Burj Khalifa”.
Also visit the Observation Deck on the 124th floor and get a 360 degree view of the entire city.
After that visit world famous Dubai Mall.
Day Free At Leisure-Optional-Abu Dhabi City Tour With Ferrari World/Optional Visit Museum Of Future
You have three options for Day 4.
Book any one option at the time of Booking.
Miracle Garden And Evening Global Village
Get ready to be amazed at Dubai Miracle Garden! The biggest flower garden ever with over 45 million flowers.
In the afternoon, you can head to Global Village (It’s open from November to April and has more than 70 countries taking part).
Departure
We will start our services from the Airport/Railways Station.
It will be acclimatization day and you will rest for a day which is very important
Later in the evening, you can visit Leh bazaar, Shanti Stupa and Leh Palace
Be ready for adventure. Gear up & head out and explore the beautiful land of Leh
Visit Hall of fame, The Gurudwara Pathar Sahib, The confluence of rivers of Indus and Zanskar.
Later return to Leh, Enroute visit Magnetic Hill
Visit the oldest monasteries in Nubra Valley
Visit Diskit Monastery, Later On Visit Sand Dunes of Nubra Valley
Overnight stay in camps at Hunder Village of the Nubra Valley
Proceed to Pangong Lake via Shyok Route
Visit the exact location of the famous movie “Three idiots”
Also you can see seven colour formations in the crystal-clear salt water lake
The Pangong Lake! The first view of the lake will leave you spellbound
We will ride back to Leh, crossing Changla Pass 17,350 ft
Enroute visit Rancho School (Known as 3 Idiot School), Thikshey & Shey Monestary
Transfer to Airport or Railway Station: Say See you Soon! to Memorable Destination's team Members & Proceed for your Safe onward journey.
Scenic Lakes
Udaipur boasts a series of stunning lakes, including Lake Pichola, Fateh Sagar Lake, and Udai Sagar Lake.
These serene bodies of water are surrounded by lush hills and dotted with historic palaces and temples, creating a picturesque setting that is both tranquil and captivating.
Architectural Marvels
The city is adorned with magnificent palaces, forts, and havelis, each showcasing intricate Rajput architecture and exquisite craftsmanship.

The grand City Palace, perched on the eastern banks of Lake Pichola, is a prime example, offering panoramic views of the surrounding landscape and showcasing opulent courtyards, balconies, and gardens.
Cultural Richness
Udaipur is steeped in rich cultural heritage, evident in its vibrant markets, colorful festivals, and traditional art forms.

Visitors can immerse themselves in the city's vibrant atmosphere by exploring its bustling bazaars, where they can shop for intricate handicrafts, textiles, and jewelry crafted by skilled local artisans.
Sunset Splendor
One of the most magical experiences in Udaipur is witnessing the sunset over its tranquil lakes.
As the sun dips below the horizon, the sky is painted in hues of orange, pink, and gold, casting a mesmerizing glow over the water and the surrounding architecture.
Whether viewed from the shores or from a boat cruise on the lake, the sunset in Udaipur is a sight to behold.
Romantic Ambiance
With its idyllic lakeside setting, historic architecture, and romantic ambiance, Udaipur is often hailed as one of the most romantic cities in India.

Whether enjoying a candlelit dinner at a lakeside restaurant, taking a leisurely boat ride at sunset, or staying in a luxurious heritage hotel, couples can't help but be swept away by the city's charm.

data.bannerContent: Spiritual Journey to Dwarka and Somnath

details.title: Sacred Pilgrimage to Dwarka and Somnath

description: Hotel Check-in: Upon arrival at the hotel, our team member will assist you in the Check-in process and assist till the room.
Rest Some Time: Freshen up and take some Rest and Get Ready for your Shivrajpur Beach tour.
Shivrajpur Beach: Enjoy Afternoon on Beach & take some rides & Activities over there (like Paragliding, Boating, & Adventure Rides).
Beyt Dwarka: Evening visit at Beyt Dwarka & Enjoy Scuba Diving over there to see Under Water Dwarka Village.
Nageshwar Jyotirling: After that visit Nageshwar Jyotirling and Attendant Shayan Aarti.
Overnight Stay: Transfer back to the Dwarka Hotel after a day of exploration and relaxation.
Dwarka Darshan: Attendant Mangla Aarti & take Blessings from Shree Dwarkadhish.
Breakfast at the Hotel: Fuel up for another exciting day with breakfast at the hotel.
Somnath Darshan: Attendant Noon Aarti & take Blessings.
Sasan Gir Resort: Enjoy evening in Resort (Play Indoor & Outdoors Games like Cricket🏏, Volleyball🏀 & Badminton🏸)
Overnight Stay: At the Sasan Gir Resort after a day of exploration and relaxation.
Breakfast at the Resort: Start the day with a hearty breakfast at the hotel.
Sasan Gir: Visit Sasan Gir Forest & fill the beauty of Nature, Birds & Animals.
Devalia Park: After that Explore Devalia Park.
End Of your journey: Evening Depart for Ahmedabad.

data.bannerContent: Explore the sun-kissed beaches and vibrant nightlife of Goa, India's premier beach destination.

details.title: Explore the sun-kissed beaches and vibrant nightlife of Goa, India's premier beach destination.

description: Explore the bustling beaches of Baga and Calangute.
Relax on the sandy shores and enjoy water sports activities.
Visit local beach shacks for authentic Goan cuisine and refreshing drinks.
Discover the historic charm of Old Goa.
Visit centuries-old churches and cathedrals, including Basilica of Bom Jesus and Se Cathedral.
Explore the vibrant streets lined with colonial-era buildings and museums.
Embark on a scenic river cruise along the Mandovi River.
Enjoy panoramic views of mangrove forests and quaint villages.
Experience traditional Goan music and dance performances on board.
Relax and unwind on the serene beaches of Palolem and Agonda.
Take a leisurely stroll or indulge in yoga and meditation sessions.
Witness breathtaking sunsets over the Arabian Sea.
Explore the lush greenery of Goa's countryside.
Visit spice plantations and coconut groves.
Engage in eco-tourism activities such as bird watching and nature walks.
Departure From Home Town By Train
Travel Towards Kasol By Traveller/Bus
Tibetan Monastery Visit
Free Time For River Rafting & Paragliding
Arrival At Manali
Bijli Mahadev
Naggar Visit
Campfire
Stay In Riverside Camp Site
Transfer To Solang Valley
Anjani Mahadev Trek
Free Time For Adventure Activities In Solang Valley
Stay In Hotel
Manali Sight Seeing
Campfire & Group Activities
Stay In Riverside Camp Site
Manikaran Gurudwara
Chalal Trek
Campfire
Stay In Riverside Camp Site
Start Return Journey By Traveller/Bus
Arrival in Bali
Hotel Check-in: Upon arrival at the hotel, our team member will assist you in the Check-in process.
Rest and relax at the hotel.
Explore the local area and enjoy the vibrant nightlife of Bali.
Ubud Exploration
Visit the Ubud Monkey Forest and Ubud Palace.
Explore the local art markets.
Enjoy a traditional Balinese dance performance.
Kintamani and Mount Batur
Visit the Kintamani Volcano and Lake Batur.
Enjoy the scenic views of Mount Batur.
Stop by the Tegalalang Rice Terraces for some breathtaking views.
Beach Day at Nusa Dua
Relax on the pristine beaches of Nusa Dua.
Engage in water sports activities such as snorkeling and jet skiing.
Enjoy a beachfront seafood dinner.
Cultural Day
Visit the Tanah Lot Temple, one of Bali's most iconic sea temples.
Explore the ancient Besakih Temple, known as the Mother Temple of Bali.
Experience the rich cultural heritage of Bali through local ceremonies and traditional dances.
Departure
Hotel Check-out: Our team member will assist you in the Check-out process.
Transfer to the airport for your onward journey.
Arrival in Bangkok
Hotel Check-in: Upon arrival at the hotel, our team member will assist you in the Check-in process.
Rest and relax at the hotel.
Explore the local area and enjoy the vibrant nightlife of Bangkok.
Bangkok City Tour
Visit the Grand Palace and Wat Phra Kaew.
Explore the Wat Arun and Wat Pho temples.
Enjoy a traditional Thai dinner cruise on the Chao Phraya River.
Travel to Chiang Mai
Flight to Chiang Mai.
Visit the Doi Suthep Temple for a panoramic view of the city.
Explore the local night markets.
Chiang Mai Exploration
Visit an elephant sanctuary and learn about elephant conservation.
Explore the ancient city of Wiang Kum Kam.
Enjoy a traditional Khantoke dinner with cultural performances.
Travel to Phuket
Flight to Phuket.
Relax on the pristine beaches of Phuket.
Explore the local area and enjoy the vibrant nightlife.
Phuket Island Tour
Visit the Big Buddha and Wat Chalong Temple.
Explore the Phi Phi Islands on a day trip.
Enjoy a beachfront seafood dinner.
Departure
Hotel Check-out: Our team member will assist you in the Check-out process.
Transfer to the airport for your onward journey.
